title: Diamond ADC LFT Clash

embed.description: PokeBear / Diamond 4 40LP / 128W 105L Win Ratio 55% / Aphelios - 35W 22L Win Ratio 61%, Miss Fortune - 15W 14L Win Ratio 52%, Tristana - 15W 13L Win Ratio 54%, Lucian - 15W 11L Win Ratio 58%, Jhin - 15W 10L Win Ratio 60%

body:
I'm looking for a team to play both days. Would prefer to play tier 1. My account has tons of Friend requests so to contact me either comment on this post or join my discord (http://discord.gg/KzfmWJW) and DM me @Poke (I'm at the top). Maybe I could put together a team also if there's lots of other solo players. 

GL in Clash everyone!
